songs.title: Can’t Stay Away (Outro)
songs.lyrics:
[singing]
I can't stay away..
I can't stay away..
I can't stay away..
I can't stay away..
I, just can't stay away - I can't stay away
I, just can't stay away - I can't stay away
I, just can't stay away - I can't stay away
Can't stay the way..

I can't stay away..
I can't stay a-WAY!!!  Can't stay away
I can't stay a-WAY!!!  Aowwwwwwwwwwwww
I can't stay a-WAY!!!
Aowwww-oooooh-oha-hhh-oh-ahh..
